Name: Castle of Venia
About the game: Castle of Venia, a platform with a classic flavor of the 90s, relive a cult, inspired by the legendary Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts and Castlevania, Dress in the role of a mysterious hero who will end the tyranny of the powerful demon Venia. Thanks to the powers of the blessed sword you will have to face armies of undead, purify their souls by holding the holy sword. Use the blood crystals and prepare for the final battle with the powerful Venia Demon. Key Features: * Relive a classic * Take on armies of undead alone * Use the crystals of blood to enhance the holy sword * Recover the corrupted souls * immerse yourself in dark settings * Put an end to the tyranny of the Venia Demon
